text: 200 cm3 of a gas at 25ºC exerts a pressure of 700 mmHg. Calculate its pressure if its volume increase 350 cm3 at 75ºC.
explanation:
\(\frac{p1V 1}{T1}\) = \(\frac{P2V2}{T2}\) \(\frac{700x200}{298}\) = \(\frac{P2X 350}{348}\) P2 = \(\frac{700x200x348}{298x350}\) = 467.11mmHg

text: Beryllium and aluminum have similar properties because they?

options.D: are positioned diagonally to each other

explanation:
At the beginning of periods 2 and 3 of the Periodic Table, there are several cases where an element at the top of one group has some similarities with an element in the next group.For example, boron is a non-metal with some properties rather like silicon. Unlike the rest of Group 2, beryllium has some properties resembling aluminium. And lithium has some properties which differ from the other elements in Group 1, and in some ways resembles magnesium.There is said to be a diagonal relationship between these elements.There are several reasons for this, but each depends on the way atomic properties like electronegativity vary around the Periodic Table.
There is an explanation video availablebelow.

text: The colour of litmus in a neutral medium is
explanation:
The colour of a neutral litmus solution is purple.
Litmus solution is made up of purple dye which is extracted from Lichens.
It is a natural Indicator and it is used to indicate the presence of an acid or a base.
A litmus paper will turn red in the presence of an acid and it turns blue in the presence of a base.

text:
Calculate the quantity of electricity in coulombs required to liberate 10g of copper from a copper compound

[Cu=64, F = 96500 Cmol-1]
explanation:
Cu\(^{2+}\)  +  2e\(^-\) → Cu
If         2 x 96,500 C is required to produce  64g Cu
Then,      X  will be required to produce  10g Cu
X = \(\frac{{2}\times{96,500}\times{10}}{64}\)
X = 30, 156.25
X = 30,156.3 C

text:
CH3COOC2H5(1) + H2O(1) ⇌ CH 3COOH (aq) + C 2H 5OH (aq)

The purpose of H+ in the reaction above is to

options.B: maintain the solution at a constant PH
options.C: increase the rate of the hydrolysis
options.D: decrease the rate of the reverse reaction

explanation: The purpose of hydrogen ion is to speed up the decomposition of ethyl ethanoate to yield ethanoic acid and ethanol...so we can say that it is serving as a calalyst i.e increases the rate of hydrolysis.

A hydrocarbon has an empirical formula CH and a vapour density of 39. Determine its molecular formula.

[C = 12, H = 1]
Polystyrene is widely used as packaging materials for fragile objects during transportation because of its
explanation: EPS is known as one of the world’s most effective and lightweight insulation and packaging materials. It has low thermal conductivity and is moisture resistant, so it is often used as insulation against changing temperatures. Its high compressive strength gives it excellent shock absorption properties, making it an efficient packaging material.
